conversation.content: i want to create a simple welcome page for a new section on my web named "Members Only"

conversation.markdown:
# Feature: Members Only Welcome Page

## Description
A simple and welcoming page introducing the Members Only section of the web application.

## Acceptance Criteria
- The welcome page displays relevant content related to the Members Only section
- Users can interact with features/interactions available on the welcome page
- The design of the welcome page follows an appropriate layout and style

## Backend Changes

## Frontend Changes
- **Title: Welcome Page Design** - Create a visually appealing and user-friendly welcome page for the Members Only section
- **Title: Interactive Elements on Welcome Page** - Implement any interactive elements (forms, buttons, animations) as required for the welcome page functionality

conversation.content: I want a login system with email and password

conversation.markdown:
# Feature: Email/Password Login System

## Description
A secure login system that allows users to sign in with their email addresses and passwords.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Users can enter their email address and password to sign in
- If the provided credentials are correct, the user gains access to their account
- The system provides secure authentication mechanisms

## Backend Changes
- **Title: Implement Email/Password Authentication** - Create a backend service for handling user authentication using email addresses and passwords

## Frontend Changes
- **Title: Email/Password Login UI** - Design a user interface for email/password login

chat.response: Thank you for describing your login system feature. It sounds like you want to implement an email and password authentication system for your application.

questions.question: Will users be able to register using their email address or will they need an existing account?
Do you envision any specific password complexity rules (minimum length, special characters, etc.)?
In case of a forgotten password, should the user receive an email with a temporary link for resetting it?

feature_overview.description: A secure login system that allows users to sign in with their email addresses and passwords.
acceptance_criteria: Users can enter their email address and password to sign in
If the provided credentials are correct, the user gains access to their account
The system provides secure authentication mechanisms

backend.title: Implement Email/Password Authentication
backend.description: Create a backend service for handling user authentication using email addresses and passwords

frontend.title: Email/Password Login UI
frontend.description: Design a user interface for email/password login

conversation.content: no need to include password recovery functionality

conversation.markdown:
# Feature: Email/Password Login System

## Description
A secure login system that allows users to sign in with their email addresses and passwords.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Users can enter their email address and password to sign in
- If the provided credentials are correct, the user gains access to their account (for existing accounts)
- If the provided email does not exist, an error message is displayed and the registration process begins (for new users)
- The system provides secure authentication mechanisms for user safety

## Backend Changes
- **Title: Implement Email/Password Authentication** - Create a backend service for handling user authentication using email addresses and passwords

## Frontend Changes
- **Title: Email/Password Login UI** - Design a user interface for email/password login

chat.response:
Thank you for describing your email and password login system. To ensure I capture all the necessary details, let me ask a few questions:
- Does the user already have an account, or will they need to register using their email address?
- Are there any specific rules for password complexity (minimum length, special characters)?
- Is it necessary to include a password recovery functionality in case users forget their passwords?

questions.question: Will users be able to register using their email address or will they need an existing account?
Do you envision any specific password complexity rules (minimum length, special characters, etc.)?
In case of a forgotten password, should the user receive an email with a temporary link for resetting it?
questions.user_answer: no need to include password recovery functionality

feature_overview.description: A secure login system that allows users to sign in with their email addresses and passwords.
acceptance_criteria: Users can enter their email address and password to sign in
If the provided credentials are correct, the user gains access to their account (for existing accounts)
If the provided email does not exist, an error message is displayed and the registration process begins (for new users)
The system provides secure authentication mechanisms for user safety

backend.title: Implement Email/Password Authentication
backend.description: Create a backend service for handling user authentication using email addresses and passwords

frontend.description: Design a user interface for email/password login
